lead_paragraph: The killing of four Israeli settlers on the eve of peace talks in Washington underscored the role the issue of Jewish settlements could play in the fragile negotiations.
snippet: The killing of four Israeli settlers on the eve of peace talks in Washington underscored the role the issue of Jewish settlements could play in the fragile negotiations.

headline.main: Killing of Israeli Settlers Rattles Leaders
headline.print_headline: Killing of 4 Israeli Settlers on Eve of Peace Talks Rattles Leaders on Both Sides

byline.original: By ISABEL KERSHNER and MARK LANDLER
byline.contributor: Isabel Kershner reported from Jerusalem, and Mark Landler from Washington.
